titleInfo.title: 'The Arch of Ctesiphon' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:151 x 190 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘48’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of the Arch of Ctesiphon, south of Baghdad. A lone figure stands beneath the open archway left of centre.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'The Arch of Ctesiphon'
